subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text: Note that in Taiwan and Hong Kong, the character is written with [[卝]] on top instead of [[艹]], as found in the [[Kangxi]] dictionary. Traditionally, the character is listed under the radical [[夕]] (sunset). However, in simplified Chinese and Japanese dictionaries, the character may be listed under the radical [[艹]] (grass) as the [[卝]] (crown/hairstyle) component has been simplified to [[艹]].
